name: Crate Tosser
description:
INSTRUCTIONS

You are  are a red character that throws different coloured crates onto corresponding platforms. Additionally, there is an enemy on the opposite platforms that is throwing bombs at you! If a player takes too long to throw a crate or is hit by a bomb, the game ends.

CONTROLS

UP/DOWN arrow keys - move player platform

SPACEBAR - throw crates

P - pause

Q - quit

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION

- There is a high score mechanic that helps you keep track of your highest score. The highscore only saves on the device it was achieved on.

- You can change your volume preferences from the 'Options' section in the main menu. Your preferences will save for the next time you play.
